       <option value=53>22Pa (+53%)</option>
       <option value=56>23Pa (+56%)</option>

       <option value=98>37Pa (+98%)</option>
          </select>
        <input id="BoutonGrisI" name="Soigner" value="Se Soigner" type="submit">
    </td>
</tr>
<tr>
    <td class="pourcentage" align="center">
        Gain:<input type="text" name="indi_s" readonly="readonly" value="-">pv(s)
        <input name="bases" type="hidden" value="-6">
        <input name="gainpva" type="hidden" value="0">
    </td>
    <td class="pourcentage" align="right">

    (<input style="width:15px;font-size:8px;padding-top:3px" type="text" name="indi_sp" readonly="readonly" value="-6">%)
    </font>
    </td>

</form>
</table>
       </td>
    <td id="box_noir_Right" height="100%">&nbsp;</td>

      </div>
      <div id="third">
